summary: Dr. Kamakshi Neelkantan initially received a reprimand and was placed on probation on September 14, 2021, for failing to meet appropriate standards for medical care and maintain adequate medical records. A key condition of her probation was to propose a supervisor for approval. Due to repeated failure to comply with this requirement, her license to practice medicine in Maryland was suspended effective February 22, 2022, until she proposes an approved supervisor.
